pages.text: $(li)The Ceramist really treat and shape the ceramic.$(br)$(li)It will trade you $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/brick)Bricks$(/l), Terracotta Blocks, $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/flower_pot)Flower Pots$(/l) and even an $(l:patchouli:armors/architect_belt)Architect's Belt$(/l) for $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l) and vice versa.$(br)$(li)A Villager can get the Ceramist profession if it is near a $(l:patchouli:utility/environmental/kiln)Kiln$(/l).
